==German== {{cardinalbox|de|39|40|41|neununddreißig|einundvierzig|ord=vierzigste}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|vierzic}}, from {{inh|de|goh|fiorzug}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*fedwōr tigiwiz}}, equivalent to {{suffix|de|vier|zig}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈfɪɐ̯tsɪç/}} * {{audio|de|De-vierzig.ogg|audio}} ===Numeral=== {{head|de|numeral}} # {{cln|de|cardinal numbers}} [[forty]] ====Coordinate terms==== {{de-cardinal}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|vier}} * {{l|de|vierzehn}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
